lead_paragraph: Doug O’Neill, the trainer of I’ll Have Another, says he is not guilty of charges that could result in a 180-day suspension by the California Horse Racing Board.
snippet: Doug O’Neill, the trainer of I’ll Have Another, says he is not guilty of charges that could result in a 180-day suspension by the California Horse Racing Board.
